shortened_description: Payment request from account 4567890123 to Global Investments LLC for $250,000.00 due November 15, 2023. Funds to be transferred to account 9876543210 at First National Bank, routing number 123456789.
reason: Request for payment of a specified amount ($250,000.00) from a specific account (4567890123) to a vendor (Global Investments LLC) by a specific date (November 15, 2023) to an external account. Mention of amounts, dates and instructions for fund transfer explicitly indicate money movement outbound.
